title: [1.16.3-1.10.2][Spice of Life:Carrot Edition—生活调味料:胡萝卜版]吃是最开心的事
txt_content:
本帖最后由 15253540 于 2020-10-29 22:55 编辑 

Spice of Life:Carrot Edition
生活调味料:胡萝卜版吃货的心,觉醒!Mod简介A mod designed to encourage dietary variety! It does so by rewarding the player for eating a variety of foods instead of punishing them for failing to diversify. Instead of using the stick we use the carrot!

This mod is not a fork of Spice of Life, although it is named similarly as it is a similar concept, but reversed in terms of the effects!
这是一个鼓励饮食多样化的mod！它给予食用各种食物玩家奖励而不是惩罚。要用胡萝卜来代替棍子！
Spice of Life:Carrot Edition-生活调味料:胡萝卜版 不是 Spice of Life-生活调味料 的修改分支,而是一个作用完全相反的mod!特性 Features这个mod与生活调味料一样，是为了让玩家在游戏中吃多种不同食物，通过将生活调味料的惩罚机制改为奖励模式，通过吃下不同种类的食物（默认为5种），奖励玩家额外的生命值这个mod提供了一本名为“食物清单”的手册，书和胡萝卜以任意方法摆在合成窗口即可合成。本书提供了您的整体进度，你吃过的食物，以及您有和没有吃过的食物的列表。


mod提供可自定义的配置,包括但不限于①玩家初始的生命值②达到里程碑需要的食物种类③奖励的生命值④食物的黑/白名单详见MC百科:Sol：carrot的配置文件简明教程

相关指令
/foodlist size - 显示你吃了多少种食物,到下一个里程碑还要多少种Tells you the number of unique foods you've eaten, as well as and how many more you need to eat until your next milestone.
/foodlist clear - 清除玩家的食物清单,并且重置他的心,在服务器使用可以在游戏内刷新设置文件Clears the stored list of unique foods a player has eaten and resets their heart count. This is useful for testing when editing the config or when you want to start over.
/foodlist sync - 强制同步一个玩家的食物清单至客户端,出现问题的时候可以尝试使用Forces a sync of the food list to the client, for when something went wrong and it's mismatched.


可以联动以下mod以达到更好的效果:[饥饿改革 HungerOverhaul] —— 全新的Minecraft饥饿系统 [介绍与配置教程][1.12.2-1.7.10][Pam's Harvestcraft——潘马斯丰收工艺]美食的天堂[1.15.2-1.8][VanillaFoodPantry——食品储藏室][汉化]食品制作，食品储藏

几句闲聊

喜欢吃吃吃和做不同料理的朋友们不要错过啦!
吃了还加生命值上限(我觉得吃多了,应该加一个缓慢效果)可以配合其他饥饿改革的mod一同食用
如果你喜欢这个mod或者有什么不足可以回复告诉我噢!

资源 Resource官方下载地址: 
Latest | 1.16.3-1.9.8 | 1.16.1-1.9.7 | 1.15.X-1.9.7 | 1.14.X-1.9.6 | 1.12.X-1.8.4 | 1.10.X-1.1
度盘:（暂不提供）

前置需求:1.14之前的版本需要 AppleCore

官方更新日志:mod版本:1.9.8 | 对应游戏版本:1.16.3Updated to 1.16.3 (thanks to Rover656!)

过往更新日志:1.9.4
Made sure client config file is actually created (#76)

v1.8.3Updated Chinese localization-正式支持中文
Changes since 1.7:Reworked commands; they can now take a player as argument (still work without though)Added stable API for other developers to interact with!Fixed reaching new milestones not displaying messages.Added config option to reset food list on death.
v1.7Made blacklist actually functionally disable foods rather than just hiding themAdded whitelist as alternative to the blacklistAdded option for a minimum hunger value foods need to provide in order to count towards improving your healthAdded page to food book displaying information about the configurationImproved tooltips to be more informative and have nicer colorsHovering over the carrot to the left of the progress graph in the food book now shows you how many foods you need to taste to reach the next milestoneLarge numbers of foods are now displayed in a prettier way in the food bookFixed incompatibility with some other mods by indexing foods later in the initialization processOther minor improvements and fixes
v1.3.3Made localizable strings (esp. plural forms) more specific to allow for a wider range of languages.-增加本土化方便翻译者?Added config option to display progress messages in chat rather than above the hotbar.-增加一个按键绑定以显示当前食物奖励里程碑进程

replies.author: 别人别进来
replies.txt_content: 增益向的生活调味料，很有意思！

replies.author: 冢虎灬司马懿
replies.txt_content: 好玩的啊，做食物的动力之一

replies.author: 度梸
replies.txt_content: 这个涨的心有上线吗

replies.author: zero000038
replies.txt_content:
沒有1.7.10版的，覺得遺憾
Spice of Life的設定，雖然符合自己想讓一同遊戲的小伙伴們不要只吃同一種食物的設定，
但如果能有這類以鼓勵多吃代替禁止單吃、挑食的設定，
感覺會更讓人願意去嘗試不同食物

replies.author: 大头哦
replies.txt_content: 还是感谢楼主啦，如果这个保留惩罚也挺好的。或者怎么修改配置文件
